summary: A Bureau of Prisons SIS memorandum from MCC New York reports that inmate Nicholas Tartaglione was found in possession of a cell phone on July 2, 2019, and lists a telephone number (EFTA00097207) found in the phone's history. The document is a routine contraband report from within the prison system.

persons.name: Nicholas Tartaglione
persons.context: Inmate at MCC New York found in possession of a contraband cell phone on July 2, 2019.

persons.name: SIS Lt. Doctor
persons.context: Author of the Bureau of Prisons memorandum reporting the contraband incident.

events.title: Contraband cell phone found on inmate
events.description: Inmate Nicholas Tartaglione was found in possession of a cell phone at MCC New York.

locations: MCC New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Inmate Nicholas Tartaglione was found with a contraband cell phone on July 2, 2019.
The phone's history contained a telephone number referenced as EFTA00097207.
The report was filed by SIS Lt. Doctor at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
